title: Betcrypto.cr
author: Betcrypto.cr
content: Hi we are thinking on starting a fundraise to increase our current bankroll we have $500k but we know our site is going to get huge fast and we want to have a bigger bankroll also we have a list of high rollers $1.5M+ and a list of 10K users who are waiting for the site to get out.The site is 100% ready (we are just finishing some details with the marketing material) and we have about 500 players without a single ad and official announcement.This month the site made $28k profit in just pure random players who got to the site.We want to raise at least $400k, you can go to the site now and create an account and test everything to see the site is 100% operationalLet me know what you think and what kind of % would you be interested

comments.author: Darlenexer
comments.created_time: July 25, 2023, 08:17:38 AMLast edit: July 26, 2023, 04:02:38 AM by Darlenexer
comments.body: Thanks for the update and quick reply. I'll be sure to keep an eye on this thread. Looking for the same issue. Bumped into your thread. Thanks for creating it. Looking forward for solution. Did you have a fix on this issue? Facing same issue but no response from anyone and couldnt find this topic troubleshooting in google. official site
